documentation: PUT handler to update a specific product combination. Secured for admin access only.
DELETE handler to remove a specific product combination. Secured for admin access only.
GET handler to fetch current Delhivery settings. Secured for admin access only.
POST handler to update Delhivery settings. Secured for admin access only.
GET handler to fetch the current checkout settings. Secured for admin access only.
POST handler to update the checkout settings. Secured for admin access only.
GET handler to fetch the current auto-approval settings. Secured for admin access only.
POST handler to update the auto-approval settings. Secured for admin access only.
GET handler to check if a product SKU is unique across the catalog. Secured for admin access only.
POST /api/orders/bulk Bulk operations on orders (approve, reject, ship)
POST handler to trigger a batch recalculation of loyalty tiers for all customers. Secured for admin access only.
GET /api/customer/tracking/[awb] Track order by AWB number (for guest users)
GET /api/customer/orders Fetch customer orders by customerId or phone
GET /api/customer/orders/[orderId] Get specific customer order details
POST /api/customer/orders/create Create order from customer-facing app (no authentication required)
Validates items and enriches with product details
Generate order ID
Calculate expected delivery date
POST /api/customer/coupons/validate Validate coupon code for customer (no auth required)
GET /api/admin/tracking/status Get tracking system status and statistics
POST /api/admin/tracking/status Manually trigger tracking sync
POST /api/admin/migrate-customer-orders One-time migration to sync existing orders to customerOrders collection
GET /api/admin/coupons List all coupons with optional filtering
POST /api/admin/coupons Create a new coupon
GET /api/admin/coupons/[couponId] Get specific coupon details
PUT /api/admin/coupons/[couponId] Update coupon
DELETE /api/admin/coupons/[couponId] Delete coupon (soft delete by setting isActive to false)
GET /api/admin/coupons/[couponId]/stats Get coupon usage statistics
GET /api/admin/cache/customers Get cache statistics
POST /api/admin/cache/customers Refresh customer cache from Firestore
GET /api/admin/analytics/traffic-sources Get traffic source analytics
